name: DogFight Simulator
description:
All in one Dogfight simulator inspired by classic world war games of windows 95/98. Game runs on all platforms- Mac, Linux and PC.

Update: collecting funds to convert game to VR/android/ios for all major VR devices and google cardboard.

A DEMO is available for free to test if the full version will work on your OS/Windows/Linux version, please test demo before you purchase full version, Thanks.

продажа,инди,имитатор,Игра инди,дешево,低廉,独立,拍卖,模拟器,独立游戏,تخفيض السعر
